trans-unit.source: Represents a control that lets the user select from a range of values by moving a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> control along a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" />을 따라 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> 컨트롤을 이동하여 값 범위에서 선택할 수 있는 컨트롤을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control lets users select a value from a range of values.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 컨트롤 값의 범위에서 값을 선택 하는 사용자가 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows an example of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: 다음 그림의 예가 나와 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: **Example of a Slider Control**
![Slider illustration](~/add/media/genericslider.png "Slider illustration")
You can customize a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control by setting its properties.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 지정할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 해당 속성을 설정 하 여 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following list describes some of the attributes of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> that you can customize:
trans-unit.target: 다음 목록에는 설명의 특성 중 일부는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 사용자 지정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The orientation of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>, either horizontal or vertical.
The tick mark locations along the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> track.
The display of tooltips to show the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.
trans-unit.target: 현재 값을 표시 하는 도구 설명 표시는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The ability of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> to either snap to tick marks or to be positioned at any point along the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.
trans-unit.target: 능력은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> 를 언제 든 지 배치할 또는 눈금 표시에는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The direction of increasing value along the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.
For more information about how to customize a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control, see the individual member.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 지정 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 제어 개별 멤버를 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> overrides the metadata of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> property and sets its default to 10.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 메타 데이터 재정의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> 속성의 기본값을 10으로 설정 하 고 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Dependency Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview.md).
If the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> is animated, the user may no longer be able to interact with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control after the animation finishes.
trans-unit.target: 경우의 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 는 애니메이션을 적용할 사용자 더 이상 수와 상호 작용할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 애니메이션 완료 한 후 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Set a Property After Animating It with a Storyboard](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-set-a-property-after-animating-it-with-a-storyboard.md) for options of how you can restore user control of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> after it is animated.
trans-unit.target: 참조 [하는 방법: 설정는 속성 후 애니메이션에 스토리](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-set-a-property-after-animating-it-with-a-storyboard.md) 의 사용자 정의 컨트롤을 복원 하는 방법을의 옵션에 대 한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 애니메이션 효과가 적용 되어 후 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Customizing the Slider Control
To apply the same property settings to multiple <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 여러 동일한 속성 설정을 적용 하려면 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 컨트롤을 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 기본값을 수정할 수 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> 고유한 모양을 제어할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 만들기에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, 참조 [는 ControlTemplate을 만들어 기존 컨트롤의 모양 사용자 지정](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>, see [Slider Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/slider-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: 부분 및 관련 된 상태를 보려면는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>, 참조 [슬라이더 스타일 및 템플릿](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/slider-styles-and-templates.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 종속성 속성을이 컨트롤은 컨트롤의 기본 스타일으로 설정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 기본 스타일 속성은 응용 프로그램에이 컨트롤이 표시 하는 경우 속성이 기본값에서 변경 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 기본 스타일 응용 프로그램이 실행 중인 때 사용 되는 데스크톱 테마에 따라 결정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: 시각적 속성을 설정만 영향을 미칠 경우 해당 속성을 둘 다에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 컨트롤의 기본 템플릿에 하 고 사용 하 여 설정 됩니다는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: "변경의 시각적 구조의 정도 제어" 섹션의 시각적 속성 목록을 찾을 수 있습니다 [는 ControlTemplate을 만들어 기존 컨트롤의 모양 사용자 지정](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following examples shows how to bind the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예에서는 바인딩하는 방법을 보여 줍니다는 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle> 에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control that is named `RectangeHeight` that can have a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> between 0 and 200.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 정의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 라는 컨트롤을 `RectangeHeight` 수 있는 한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> 0과 200 사이입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to define a <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle> that binds its <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> property to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 정의 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.는 <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle> 바인딩하는 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> 속성을는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: (In the complete sample, a similar binding is created for the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> property.)
trans-unit.target: (전체 샘플에는 유사한 바인딩을 대해 만들어집니다는 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> 속성입니다.)

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> class.
The computed <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> that is used to arrange the control.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤을 정렬하는 데 사용되는 계산된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Arranges the content of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> and determines its <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />의 콘텐츠를 정렬하고 해당 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" />를 결정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The computed <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.

Gets or sets whether a tooltip that contains the current value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> displays when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" />을 누르면 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />의 현재 값이 들어 있는 도구 설명을 표시할지 여부를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: If a tooltip is displayed, this property also specifies the placement of the tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 도구 설명이 표시되면 이 속성은 도구 설명의 위치도 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.AutoToolTipPlacement" /> values that determines where to display the tooltip with respect to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />, or that specifies to not show a tooltip.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" />을 기준으로 도구 설명을 표시할 위치를 결정하거나 도구 설명이 표시되지 않도록 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.AutoToolTipPlacement" /> 값 중 하나입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.AutoToolTipPlacement.None" />, which specifies that a tooltip is not displayed.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.AutoToolTipPlacement.None" />이며, 도구 설명이 표시되지 않도록 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.AutoToolTipPlacement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 설정 하 여 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.AutoToolTipPlacement%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.AutoToolTipPlacement" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.AutoToolTipPlacement%2A> dependency property.

Gets or sets the number of digits that are displayed to the right side of the decimal point for the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> in a tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 도구 설명에서 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" />에서 소수점 오른쪽에 표시되는 자릿수를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The precision of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> that displays in the tooltip, specified as the number of digits that appear to the right of the decimal point.
trans-unit.target: 도구 설명에 표시되는 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" />의 정밀도이며, 소수점 오른쪽에 표시되는 자릿수로 지정됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is zero (0).
The value of this property must be a non-negative integer.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성의 값은 음수가 아닌 정수 여야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to a value other than a non-negative integer, an exception occurs.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 음수가 아닌 정수 이외의 값으로, 예외가 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.AutoToolTipPrecision%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.AutoToolTipPrecision%2A> 속성을 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.AutoToolTipPrecision" /> is set to a value other than a non-negative integer.
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.AutoToolTipPrecision" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.AutoToolTipPrecision%2A> dependency property.

Gets a command that decreases the value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> by the same amount as the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />의 값을 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange" /> 속성 값만큼 줄이는 명령을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> that decreases the value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> by the same amount as the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange" /> property.
The default <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputGesture" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.Key.PageDown" />.
If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputGesture> for this command is <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key.PageUp>.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A> 속성이 `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputGesture> 이 명령에 대 한 <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key.PageUp>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange%2A> property is (0.1).
XAML Attribute Usage

Gets a command that decreases the value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> by the same amount as the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />의 값을 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange" /> 속성 값만큼 줄이는 명령을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> that decreases the value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> by the same amount as the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange" /> property.
The default <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputGesture" /> objects are <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.Key.Down" /> and <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.Key.Left" />.

If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputGesture> objects are <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key.Up> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key.Right>.
The default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange%2A> property is (0.1).
XAML Attribute Usage

Gets or sets the amount of time in milliseconds that a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> waits, while it is pressed, before a command to move the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> executes, such as a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.DecreaseLarge" /> command.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" />을 누른 후 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" />을 이동하는 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.DecreaseLarge" /> 등의 명령이 실행될 때까지 대기하는 시간(밀리초)을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: A time delay in milliseconds.
The default is the system key press delay.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 시스템 키 입력 지연 시간입니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemParameters.KeyboardDelay" />.

This property is used when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> is included in the style for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.The default style for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> includes two invisible <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls that use the space between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> and each end of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 사용 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> 에 스타일을 포함 한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>합니다. 에 대 한 기본 스타일은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 보이지 않는 두 포함 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> 사이의 간격을 사용 하는 컨트롤의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> 양쪽 끝는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>합니다.

trans-unit.source: When you press one of the invisible buttons, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> responds by moving the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> in that direction after the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Delay%2A> property is applied.
trans-unit.target: 보이지 않는 단추 중 하나를 누를 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 이동 하 여 응답에서 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> 후 해당 방향에는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Delay%2A> 속성이 적용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Delay" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Delay%2A> dependency property.
Gets a command that increases the value of the slider by the same amount as the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 슬라이더의 값을 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange" /> 속성 값만큼 늘리는 명령을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> that increases the value of the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStartProperty" /> by the same amount as the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange" /> property.
The default <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputGesture" /> for this command is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.Key.PageUp" />.

If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputGesture> for this command is <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key.PageDown>.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A> 속성이 `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputGesture> 이 명령에 대 한 <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key.PageDown>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange%2A> property is (1).
XAML Attribute Usage
Gets a command that increases the value of the slider by the same amount as the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 슬라이더의 값을 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange" /> 속성 값만큼 늘리는 명령을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> that increases the value of the slider by the same amount as the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 슬라이더의 값을 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange" /> 속성 값만큼 늘리는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> 를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputGesture" /> objects for this command are <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.Key.Up" /> and <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.Key.Right" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 명령의 기본 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputGesture" /> 개체는 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.Key.Up" /> 및 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.Key.Right" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputGesture> objects for this command are <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key.Down> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key.Left> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A> 속성이 `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputGesture> 이 명령에 대 한 개체는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key.Down> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key.Left> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange%2A> property is (0.1).
XAML Attribute Usage

Gets or sets the amount of time in milliseconds between increase or decrease commands when a user clicks the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />의 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" />을 클릭할 때 늘리기 또는 줄이기 명령 사이에 적용되는 시간(밀리초)을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: A time in milliseconds between commands that change the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.
The default is the system key repeat rate.
For more information, see [SystemParametersInfo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/sysinfo/base/systemparametersinfo.asp) (SPI_GETKEYBOARDSPEED).
This property is used when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> is included in the <xref:System.Windows.Style> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 사용 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> 에 포함 된 <xref:System.Windows.Style> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Interval" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Interval%2A> dependency property.
Gets or sets the direction of increasing value.
<see langword="true" /> if the direction of increasing value is to the left for a horizontal slider or down for a vertical slider; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 값이 늘어나는 방향이 가로 슬라이더의 왼쪽이거나 세로 슬라이더의 아래쪽이면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
The value of this property determines the direction of increasing value of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성의 값의 값이 늘어나는 방향을 결정 한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, when you move the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control up on a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A> property is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> increases.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 이동 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> 세로에서 제어를 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A> 속성이 `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 증가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A> property is changed to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> decreases as the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> moves up.
trans-unit.target: 하는 경우의 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A> 속성이 `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 는 감소는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> 위로 이동 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> property for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control that it implements.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> 속성에 대 한는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 구현 합니다.

Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A> dependency property.

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> moves immediately to the location of the mouse click that occurs while the mouse pointer pauses on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> track.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> 트랙 위에 마우스 포인터를 올려 놓고 클릭하면 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />의<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />이 해당 위치로 즉시 이동하는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> moves immediately to the location of a mouse click; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" />이 마우스 클릭 위치로 즉시 이동하면<see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.

When this property is set to `false` and a mouse click occurs along the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> away from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> moves in the direction of the mouse click.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성이로 설정 된 경우 `false` 마우스 클릭 및는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 에서 멀리는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> 클릭 마우스의 방향으로 이동 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Instead of moving immediately to the mouse click location, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> moves a distance that is defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange%2A> property for each mouse click.
trans-unit.target: 마우스 클릭 위치로 즉시 이동 하는 대신는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> 이동 하 여 정의 된 거리는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange%2A> 각 마우스에 대 한 속성을 클릭 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The effect of multiple mouse clicks can be emulated by pressing and holding the left mouse button until the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> is repositioned to the desired location.
trans-unit.target: 될 때까지 마우스 왼쪽된 단추를 눌러 여러 마우스 클릭의 효과 에뮬레이트할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> 원하는 위치에 재배치 합니다.

Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None

The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsMoveToPointEnabled%2A> dependency property.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> displays a selection range along the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />에서 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />를 따라 선택 범위를 표시할지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a selection range is displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 선택 범위를 표시하면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStart%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionEnd%2A> properties define a selection range and must be set for the selection range to appear when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsSelectionRangeEnabled%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStart%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionEnd%2A> 속성 선택 범위를 정의 하 고 표시할 때 선택 범위 설정 해야 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsSelectionRangeEnabled%2A> 로 설정 된 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> with a selection range defined.
trans-unit.target: 다음 그림에서는 한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 선택 범위가 정의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: **A selection range defined for a Slider control**
trans-unit.target: **슬라이더 컨트롤에 대해 정의 된 선택 범위**

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> automatically moves the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> to the closest tick mark.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />에서 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" />을 자동으로 가장 가까운 눈금으로 옮길지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> requires the position of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> to be a tick mark; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />에서 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" />의 위치를 눈금으로 옮겨야 하면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.

When the position of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> is changed and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsSnapToTickEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> is automatically moved to the closest tick mark.
trans-unit.target: 때의 위치는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> 변경 되 고 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsSnapToTickEnabled%2A> 속성이로 설정 되어 `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> 가장 가까운 눈금으로 자동으로 이동 됩니다.

Gets a command that sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /><see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum" /> value.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> to use.
The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.Key.End" />.
XAML Attribute Usage

Gets a command that sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /><see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum" /> value.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> to use.
The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.Key.Home" />.
XAML Attribute Usage
Builds the visual tree for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> control.
Creates an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.SliderAutomationPeer" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.
Responds to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.DecreaseLarge" /> command.

This method decreases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange%2A> and moves the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> to reflect the change.
trans-unit.target: 이 방법을 사용 하면는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 여 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange%2A> 이동는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> 변경 사항을 반영 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Responds to a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.DecreaseSmall" /> command.

This method decreases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange%2A> and moves the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> to reflect the change.
trans-unit.target: 이 방법을 사용 하면는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 여 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange%2A> 이동는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> 변경 사항을 반영 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Responds to an <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IncreaseLarge" /> command.

This method increases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange%2A> and moves the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> to reflect the change.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드 증가 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 여 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange%2A> 이동는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> 변경 사항을 반영 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Responds to an <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IncreaseSmall" /> command.

This method increases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange%2A> and moves the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> to reflect the change.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드 증가 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 여 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange%2A> 이동는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> 변경 사항을 반영 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Responds to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.MaximizeValue" /> command.

This method changes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> and moves the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> to reflect the change.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 변경의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 를 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> 이동는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> 변경 사항을 반영 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The old value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum" /> property.
The new value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum" /> property.
Responds to a change in the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum" /> property.

If the new <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> value is less than the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStart%2A> value, this implementation sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStart%2A> value to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 하는 경우 새 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> 값은 보다 작은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStart%2A> 값이이 구현 설정는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStart%2A> 값을 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: If the new <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> value is less than the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionEnd%2A> value, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionEnd%2A> value is set to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 하는 경우 새 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> 값은 보다 작은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionEnd%2A> 값의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionEnd%2A> 값으로 설정 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Responds to a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.MinimizeValue" /> command.

This method changes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> and moves the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> to reflect the change.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 변경의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 를 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> 이동는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> 변경 사항을 반영 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The old value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum" /> property.
The new value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum" /> property.
Responds to a change in the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum" /> property.

This implementation makes sure that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStart%2A> value is greater than or equal to the new <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현을 사용 하면는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStart%2A> 값은 새 보다 크거나 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStart%2A> value is less than the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> value, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStart%2A> value is set to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStart%2A> 값은 보다 작은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> 값의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStart%2A> 값으로 설정 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionEnd%2A> value is also checked to make sure that it is greater than or equal to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStart%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionEnd%2A> 값 보다 크거나 같지 않은지를 확인 하려면 확인란도 선택은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStart%2A> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 라우트된 <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown" /> 이벤트에 대한 클래스 처리를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsMoveToPointEnabled%2A> property is `true`, this implementation moves the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> to the location of the mouse click.
trans-unit.target: 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsMoveToPointEnabled%2A> 속성은 `true`, 이동이 구현에서 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> 마우스의 위치를 클릭 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현에서 <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown> 이벤트를 설정 하 여 처리 된 것으로 <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> 에 이벤트 데이터의 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The event is handled by this method so that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> do not handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트는이 메서드에서 처리 하므로 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> 의 제어는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 이벤트를 처리 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: If you override <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.OnPreviewMouseLeftButtonDown(System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)" />, always call the base implementation in your <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.OnPreviewMouseLeftButtonDown(System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 재정의 하는 경우 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.OnPreviewMouseLeftButtonDown(System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)" />, 항상 기본 구현을 호출 프로그램 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.OnPreviewMouseLeftButtonDown(System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)" /> 구현 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.
trans-unit.target: 기본 구현을 호출 하지 않으면 최종 클래스의 런타임 동작을 변경할 수는 클래스 처리기를 사용 하 여 이벤트 처리에서 기본 클래스를 방지 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.
trans-unit.target: 요구 사항에 따라 앞 이나 뒤를 별도로 처리 하는 기본 구현을 호출할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The event data.

Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted" /> event that occurs when the user stops dragging the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />의 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" />을 끄는 동작을 중지할 때 발생하는 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted" /> 이벤트에 대한 클래스 처리를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> event data.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현은 처리 상태를 변경 되지 않습니다 (의 <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> 속성)의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> 이벤트 데이터입니다.

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden to customize the way a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> processes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> movements.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 방법을 사용자 지정할 재정의할 수 있습니다는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> 프로세스 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> 이동 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If you override <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.OnThumbDragCompleted(System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragCompletedEventArgs)" />, always call the base implementation in your <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.OnThumbDragCompleted(System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragCompletedEventArgs)" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 재정의 하는 경우 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.OnThumbDragCompleted(System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragCompletedEventArgs)" />, 항상 기본 구현을 호출 프로그램 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.OnThumbDragCompleted(System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragCompletedEventArgs)" /> 구현 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.
trans-unit.target: 기본 구현을 호출 하지 않으면 최종 클래스의 런타임 동작을 변경할 수는 클래스 처리기를 사용 하 여 이벤트 처리에서 기본 클래스를 방지 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.
trans-unit.target: 요구 사항에 따라 앞 이나 뒤를 별도로 처리 하는 기본 구현을 호출할 수 있습니다.

Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta" /> event that occurs when the user drags the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> 의 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" />을 마우스로 끌 때 발생하는 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta" /> 이벤트에 대한 클래스 처리를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: If you override <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.OnThumbDragDelta(System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragDeltaEventArgs)" />, always call the base implementation in your <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.OnThumbDragDelta(System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragDeltaEventArgs)" /> implementation.

trans-unit.source: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.

trans-unit.source: The event data.

Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted" /> event that occurs when the user starts to drag the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />의 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" />을 마우스로 끌기 시작할 때 발생하는 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted" /> 이벤트에 대한 클래스 처리를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: In addition to the default processing of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted> event, this implementation displays a tooltip that shows the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.AutoToolTipPlacement%2A> property is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.AutoToolTipPlacement.None>.
trans-unit.target: 기본 처리 외에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted> 이벤트의 경우이 구현을 보여 주는 도구 설명이 표시 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.AutoToolTipPlacement%2A> 속성으로 설정 되지 않은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.AutoToolTipPlacement.None>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not handle the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted> event.
The value of the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragCompletedEventArgs> is not changed.
This method can be overridden to customize the way a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> processes <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> movements.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 방법을 사용자 지정할 재정의할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 프로세스 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> 이동 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The old <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.
The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.
Updates the current position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> 속성이 변경될 때 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />의 현재 위치를 업데이트합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the orientation of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.
One of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation" /> values.
The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Horizontal" />.

This property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> property for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> implements.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> 속성에 대 한는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 하는 컨트롤을 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 구현 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A> 속성을 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A> dependency property.
Gets or sets the largest value of a specified selection for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />에 지정된 선택 범위에서 가장 큰 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The largest value of a selected range of values of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />에서 선택된 값 범위에서 가장 큰 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is zero (0.0).

The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionEnd%2A> property cannot be greater than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> property and cannot be less than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionEnd%2A> 속성의 값 보다 클 수 없습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> 속성의 값 보다 작을 수 없습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionEnd%2A> property must also be greater than or equal to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStart%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionEnd%2A> 속성의 값 보다 크거나 수도 있어야는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStart%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionEnd%2A> property is greater than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> property or less than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> property, the value is set to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> property respectively.
trans-unit.target: 경우의 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionEnd%2A> 속성의 값 보다 크면는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> 속성의 값 보다 작거나는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> 속성 값의 값으로 설정 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> 속성 각각.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier Field
Metadata properties set to `true`
The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionEnd%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionEnd%2A> 속성을 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionEnd" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionEnd%2A> dependency property.
Gets or sets the smallest value of a specified selection for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />에 지정된 선택 범위에서 가장 작은 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The largest value of a selected range of values of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />에서 선택된 값 범위에서 가장 큰 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is zero (0.0).

The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStart%2A> property cannot be less than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> property and cannot be greater than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStart%2A> 속성의 값 보다 작을 수 없습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> 속성의 값 보다 클 수 없습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionEnd%2A> property must also be greater than or equal to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStart%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionEnd%2A> 속성의 값 보다 크거나 수도 있어야는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStart%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStart%2A> is less than <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> or greater than <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStart%2A> is set to the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> respectively.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStart%2A> 는 보다 작은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> 보다 큰 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStart%2A> 의 값으로 설정 되어 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> 각각.

Identifier Field
Metadata properties set to `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStart" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStart%2A> dependency property.
Gets or sets the interval between tick marks.
The distance between tick marks.
The default is (1.0).
If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Ticks%2A> property is set to a value that is not `null`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickFrequency%2A> property is not used.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Ticks%2A> 하지 않은 값이 속성은 `null`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickFrequency%2A> 속성이 사용 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> property must be set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickPlacement.None> for tick marks to appear along the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> 이외의 속성 값으로 설정 해야 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickPlacement.None> 눈금을 따라 표시 하려면는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Tick marks are drawn at an interval that is specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickFrequency%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 간격으로 눈금 표시 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickFrequency%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The tick marks start at the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> property and continue until the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> property is reached.
trans-unit.target: 값에 눈금 표시가 시작은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> 속성의 값 때까지 계속는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> 속성에 도달 합니다.

None

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickFrequency" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickFrequency%2A> dependency property.
Gets or sets the position of tick marks with respect to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />의 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />을 기준으로 눈금의 위치를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement" /> value that defines how to position the tick marks in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> with respect to the slider bar.
trans-unit.target: 슬라이더 막대를 기준으로 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />에서 눈금을 배치할 방법을 정의하는 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement" /> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickPlacement.None" />.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> property must be set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickPlacement.None> for tick marks to appear.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> 이외의 속성 값으로 설정 해야 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickPlacement.None> 눈금을 표시 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> 속성을 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> dependency property.
Gets or sets the positions of the tick marks to display for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />에 표시할 눈금의 위치를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: A set of tick marks to display for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.
The default is <see langword="null" />.

Tick marks that are outside the range that is defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> property values are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 눈금에서 정의 된 범위를 벗어난은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> 속성 값은 무시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> property must be set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickPlacement.None> for tick marks to appear.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> 이외의 속성 값으로 설정 해야 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickPlacement.None> 눈금을 표시 합니다.
